data.name: AnalyticsPromptMessage
data.value: Do you want to help Google by reporting usage statics?
data.comment: Message for the analytics prompt.

data.name: AnalyticsPromptTitle
data.comment: Title for the analytics prompt.

data.name: CloudExploreOperationTimeoutMessage
data.value: The operation took too long to complete and timed out.
data.comment: A message denoting the operation took too long.

data.name: CloudExploreOperationCanceledMessage
data.comment: A message denoting the operation was canceld.

data.name: CloudExploreDisabledApiEnableApiMenuHeader
data.comment: Menu header for the Enable API command.

data.name: CloudExploreNoProjectMessage
data.value: No projects found, to create a project navigate to the Google Cloud Console.
data.comment: Message shwon int he Cloud Explorer when no project is found.

data.name: CloudExplorerConsoleLinkCaption
data.value: Go to the Google Cloud Console for other services
data.comment: The caption for the console link in the cloud source.

data.name: CloudExplorerGceCreateOrResetPasswordMenuHeader
data.comment: Header for the create or reset password menu item.

data.name: CloudExplorerGceFailedToGetOauthCredentialsCaption
data.comment: Caption for the prompt.

data.name: CloudExplorerGceFailedToGetOauthCredentialsMessage
data.value: Failed to fetch OAUTH credentials for account {0}, please login again.
data.comment: Message shown when failed to get OAUTH credentials for account. {0} is the account's email address.

data.name: CloudExplorerGceFailedToStartInstanceMessage
data.comment: Message shown when failed to start an instance. {0} is the instance name, {1} is the error message.

data.name: CloudExplorerGceFailedToStopInstanceMessage
data.comment: Message shown when failed to stop an instance. {0} is the instance name, {1} is the error message.

data.name: CloudExplorerGceFailedToUpdateFirewallCaption
data.comment: Caption for the message shown when failed to update firewall.

data.name: CloudExplorerGceFailedToUpdateFirewallMessage
data.value: Failed to update Firewall rules for instance.
data.comment: Message shown when failed to update firewall.

data.name: CloudExplorerGceInstanceAppEngineCategory
data.comment: The category for App Engine properties for a GCE instance.

data.name: CloudExplorerGceInstanceCategory
data.comment: The category for the properties window for the GCE instance.

data.name: CloudExplorerGceInstanceInternalIpDescription
data.value: The internal IP address of the instance
data.comment: The description of the internal IP property for a GCE instance.

data.name: CloudExplorerGceInstanceInternalIpDisplayName
data.comment: The display name for the internal IP property for a GCE instance.

data.name: CloudExplorerGceInstanceMachineTypeDescription
data.value: The machine type for the instance
data.comment: The description of the machine type for a GCE instance.

data.name: CloudExplorerGceInstanceMachineTypeDisplayName
data.comment: The display name for the machine type of a GCE instance.

data.name: CloudExplorerGceInstanceModuleDescription
data.value: The App Engine module for the instance.
data.comment: The description for the module of a GCE instance.

data.name: CloudExplorerGceInstanceNameDescription
data.comment: The description of the name property for a GCE instance.

data.name: CloudExplorerGceInstancePublicIpDescription
data.value: The public IP address of the instance
data.comment: The description for the public IP property for a GCE instance.

data.name: CloudExplorerGceInstancePublicIpDisplayName
data.comment: The display name for the public IP property for a GCE instance.

data.name: CloudExplorerGceInstanceSettingTagsCaption
data.comment: Caption used when setting tags for a GCE VM, {0} is the name of the instance.

data.name: CloudExplorerGceInstanceStartingCaption
data.comment: Caption used when starting a GCE VM, {0} is the name of the instance.

data.name: CloudExplorerGceInstanceStatusDescription
data.value: The current status of the instance
data.comment: The description of the status property for a GCE instance.

data.name: CloudExplorerGceInstanceStoppingCaption
data.comment: Caption used when stopping a GCE VM, {0} is the name of the instance.

data.name: CloudExplorerGceInstanceTagsDescription
data.comment: The description for the tags property for a GCE instance.

data.name: CloudExplorerGceInstanceUpdatingFirewallCaption
data.comment: Caption used when updating the forewall for a GCE VM, {0} is the name of the instance.

data.name: CloudExplorerGceInstanceVersionDescription
data.value: The version of the module for the instance.
data.comment: The description for the version of a GCE instance.

data.name: CloudExplorerGceInstanceWindowsCategory
data.comment: The category for Windows properties for a GCE instance.

data.name: CloudExplorerGceInstanceWindowsVersionDescription
data.value: The version of Windows installed on the instance.
data.comment: The description for the Windows version property for a GCE instance.

data.name: CloudExplorerGceInstanceWindowsVersionDisplayName
data.comment: The display name for the Windows version in a GCE instance.

data.name: CloudExplorerGceInstanceZoneDescription
data.comment: The description of the zone property for a GCE instance.

data.name: CloudExplorerGceManageFirewallPortsMenuHeader
data.comment: Header for the manage firewall ports menu item.

data.name: CloudExplorerGceNewAspNetInstanceMenuHeader
data.comment: Header for the new ASP.NET instance menu item.

data.name: CloudExplorerGceNewInstanceMenuHeader
data.comment: Header for the new instance menu item.

data.name: CloudExplorerGceNoInstancesInZoneCaption
data.comment: The caption to show when there are no instances in a GCE zone.

data.name: CloudExplorerGceNoWindowsInstancesInZoneCaption
data.value: No Windows instances in this zone
data.comment: The caption to show when there are no Windows instances in a GCE zone.

data.name: CloudExplorerGceOnlyWindowsButtonToolTip
data.comment: The tooltip for the filter button.

data.name: CloudExplorerGceOpenTerminalSessionMenuHeader
data.comment: Header for the open terminal session menu item.

data.name: CloudExplorerGceOpenWebSiteMenuHeader
data.comment: Header for the open website menu item.

data.name: CloudExplorerGcePublishingSettingsSavedMessage
data.comment: Message shown after saving publishing settings. {0} is the path where the settings where saved.

data.name: CloudExplorerGceRootNodeCaption
data.comment: Caption for the root node of the GCE source.

data.name: CloudExplorerGceSavePublishSettingsDialogCaption
data.comment: Caption for the save dialog.

data.name: CloudExplorerGceSavePublishSettingsExtensions
data.comment: Extension for the save dialog. Format defined as part of the Save Dialog spec, do not over translate.

data.name: CloudExplorerGceSavePublishSettingsMenuHeader
data.comment: Header for the save publish settings menu item.

data.name: CloudExplorerGceShowAllOsInstancesCommand
data.comment: Caption for the command that shows all of the instances regardless of OS.

data.name: CloudExplorerGceShowInstancesCommand
data.comment: Caption for the command to show instances instead of zones.

data.name: CloudExplorerGceShowWindowsOnlyInstancesCommand
data.comment: Caption for the command that shows only the Windows instances.

data.name: CloudExplorerGceShowZonesCommand
data.comment: Caption for the command that shows the zones.

data.name: CloudExplorerGceSourceApiDisabledMessage
data.value: The Google Compute Engine API is not enabled for this project.
data.comment: Message shown when the GCE API is disabled.

data.name: CloudExplorerGceSourceFailedLoadingZonesCaption
data.comment: Caption shown in the node when failed to load GCE zones.

data.name: CloudExplorerGceSourceLoadingZonesCaption
data.comment: Caption shown in the node when loading GCE zones.

data.name: CloudExplorerGceSourceNoZonesCaption
data.comment: Caption shown in the node when no GCE zones are found.

data.name: CloudExplorerGceStartInstanceConfirmationPrompt
data.value: Are you sure you want to start {0}?
data.comment: Prompt shown to the user to confirm start of instance. {0} is the name of the instance.

data.name: CloudExplorerGceStartInstanceConfirmationPromptCaption
data.comment: Caption for the prompt shown to confirm start of instance. {0} is the name of the instance.

data.name: CloudExplorerGceStartInstanceMenuHeader
data.comment: Header for the start instance menu item.

data.name: CloudExplorerGceStartOperationFailedMessage
data.comment: Message shown when the start operation fails. {0} is the name of the instance, {1} is the error message.

data.name: CloudExplorerGceStopInstanceConfirmationPrompt
data.value: Are you sure you want to stop {0}?
data.comment: Prompt shown to the user to confirm stop of instance. {0} is the name of the instance.

data.comment: Caption for the prompt shown to confirm stop of instance. {0} is the name of the instance.

data.name: CloudExplorerGceStopInstanceMenuHeader
data.comment: Header for the stop instance menu item.

data.name: CloudExplorerGceStopOperationFailedMessage
data.comment: Message shown when the stop operation fails. {0} is the name of the instance, {1} is the error message.

data.name: CloudExplorerGceZoneCategory
data.comment: The category for the zone properties.

data.name: CloudExplorerGceZoneDescriptionDescription
data.comment: The description of the description property of a GCE zone.

data.comment: The description of the name property of a GCE zone.

data.name: CloudExplorerGceZoneRegionDescription
data.comment: The description of the region proeprty of a GCE zone.

data.name: CloudExplorerGceZoneStatusDescription
data.comment: The description of the status property of a GCE zone.

data.name: CloudExplorerGcsBucketCategory
data.comment: The category for GCS bucket properties.

data.value: The creation time stamp for the bucket
data.comment: The description of the created property of a GCS bucket.

data.value: The modification time stamp for the bucket

data.comment: The description of the name property of a GCS bucket.

data.value: The storage class for the bucket
data.comment: The description of the storage class property of a GCS bucket.

data.comment: The display name of the storage class property of a GCS bucket.

data.name: CloudExplorerGcsBucketVersioningEnabledDescription
data.value: Whether versioning is enabled for the bucket
data.comment: The description of the versioning enabled property of a GCS bucket.

data.name: CloudExplorerGcsBucketVersioningEnabledDisplayName
data.comment: The display name of the versioning enabled property of a GCS bucket.

data.name: CloudExplorerGcsFailedToListBucketsCaption
data.comment: Caption shown when failed to load GCS buckets.

data.name: CloudExplorerGcsLoadingBucketsCaption
data.comment: Caption shown while loading the GCS buckets.

data.name: CloudExplorerGcsNoBucketsFoundCaption
data.comment: Caption shown when no GCS buckets are found.

data.name: CloudExplorerGcsRootNodeCaption
data.comment: The caption for the root node of the GCS source.

data.name: CloudExplorerGcsSourceApiDisabledMessage
data.value: The Google Cloud Storage API is not enabled for this project.
data.comment: Message shown when the GCS API is disabled.

data.name: CloudExplorerLoadingMessage
data.comment: General loading message.

data.name: CloudExplorerNoAccountButtonCaption
data.comment: Caption for the button, or link, in the Cloud Exlorer shown when there's no account selected.

data.name: CloudExplorerNoAccountMessage
data.value: Add a new account or select and existing one.
data.comment: Message shown in the Cloud Exlorer when there's no account selected.

data.name: CloudExplorerNoProjectButtonCaption
data.comment: Caption for the button, or link, shown in the Cloud Explorer when no project is found.

data.name: CloudExplorerNoProjectsFoundPlaceholderMessage
data.comment: Message for the placeholder element displayed when no projects are found.

data.name: CloudExplorerRefreshButtonToolTip
data.comment: The tooltip for the refresh button.

data.name: CloudExplorerSelectAccountMessage
data.comment: General select account message.

data.name: CloudExplorerSqlBackendTypeDisplayName
data.comment: The display name for the backend type property for SQL instances.

data.name: CloudExplorerSqlDatabaseVersionDisplayName
data.comment: The display name for the database version proeprty for SQL instances.

data.name: CloudExplorerSqlFailedMessage
data.value: Failed to load the list of Google Cloud SQL instances.
data.comment: Message shown in the output window when failed to load list of SQL instances.

data.name: CloudExplorerSqlUpdateAthorizedNetworksErrorMessage
data.comment: Message shown when an attempt to updated authorized networks fails.

data.name: CloudExplorerSqlFailedToLoadInstancesCaption
data.comment: Caption shown when failed to load SQL instances.

data.name: CloudExplorerSqlInstanceCategory
data.comment: Category for the SQL instance properties.

data.name: CloudExplorerSqlInstanceIp6AddressDisplayName
data.comment: The display name for the IP v6 address.

data.name: CloudExplorerSqlInstanceIpAddressDisplayName
data.comment: The display name for the instance IP address.

data.name: CloudExplorerSqlInstanceTypeDisplayName
data.comment: The display name for the instance type property for SQL instances.

data.name: CloudExplorerSqlLoadingInstancesCaption
data.comment: Caption shown when loading SQL instances.

data.name: CloudExplorerSqlNoInstancesFoundCaption
data.comment: Caption shown when no SQL instances are found.

data.name: CloudExplorerSqlUpdatedAthorizedNetworksCaption
data.comment: Caption shown when the authorized networks are being updated.

data.name: CloudExplorerSqlOpenAddDataConnectionMenuHeader
data.comment: Menu header for the open add data connection dialog menu item.

data.name: CloudExplorerSqlManageAuthorizedNetworksMenuHeader
data.comment: Menu header for the option to manage authorized networks.

data.name: CloudExplorerSqlRootNodeCaption
data.comment: Caption for the root node in the SQL source.

data.name: CloudExplorerStatusMenuHeader
data.comment: Header for the status menu item.

data.name: CloudExplorerToolWindowCaption
data.comment: Cloud Explorer caption used with an account. {0} is the account's email address.

data.name: CloudExplorerToolWindowCaptionNoAccount
data.comment: Cloud Explorer caption used when no account is selected.

data.name: ManageAccountsAccountAlreadyExistsPromptMessage
data.comment: The message for the prompt indicating the account already exists.

data.name: ManageAccountsAccountAlreadyExistsPromptTitle
data.comment: The title for the prompt indicating the account already exists.

data.name: ManageAccountsAddAccountButtonCaption
data.comment: Caption for the add account button.

data.name: ManageAccountsChooseAccountMessage
data.comment: The message at the top of the manage accounts window.

data.name: ManageAccountsCurrentAccountMessage
data.comment: Message shown in the current account.

data.name: ManageAccountsDeleteAccountButtonCaption
data.comment: Caption for the delete account button.

data.name: ManageAccountsDeleteAccountPromptMessage
data.value: Are you sure you want to delete the account {0}?
data.comment: Message for the confirmation prompt for deleting an account.

data.name: ManageAccountsDeleteAccountPromptTitle
data.comment: Title for the confirmation prompt for deleting an account.

data.name: ManageAccountsSetAsCurrentAccountButtonCaption
data.comment: Caption for the set as current account button.

data.name: ManageAccountsWindowTitle
data.comment: The title for the manage accounts window.

data.name: MySqlInstallerWindowBottomMessage
data.value: Download and install the MySQL Installer which will guide you through installing the needed extensions. After they are installed restart Visual Studio.
data.comment: Bottom message for the MySql installer window.

data.name: MySqlInstallerWindowTitle
data.comment: Title for the MySql isntaller window.

data.name: MySqlInstallerWindowTopMessage
data.value: To add a Google Cloud SQL database as a Data Connection "MySQL for Visual Studio" must be installed. It is highly recommended that the "MySQL Connector/Net" also be installed to be able to properly interact with the database.
data.comment: Top message for the MySql installer window.

data.name: OAuthFlowWindowMessage
data.value: A browser window has been open to login into your account. To cancel this operation close the browser window and press Cancel to close this window. When the login finishes this window will close automatically.
data.comment: OAUTH flow window message.

data.name: OAuthFlowWindowTitle
data.comment: OAUTH flow window title.

data.name: PortManagerWindowCaption
data.comment: Caption for the port manager dialog.

data.name: PortManagerWindowMessage
data.value: Set Firewall rules and tags to enable traffic for the instance
data.comment: Main message in the port manager dialog.

data.name: AuthorizedNetworksWindowCaption
data.comment: Caption for the manage authorized networks dialog.

data.name: AuthorizedNetworksWindowMessage
data.value: Manage authorized networks that can connect to your instance.
data.comment: Main message in the authorized networks dialog.

data.name: AuthorizedNetworksWindowNameTextBoxTitle
data.comment: Title for the name text box use to create new authorized networks.

data.name: AuthorizedNetworksWindowValueTextBoxTitle
data.comment: Title for the value text box use to create new authorized networks.

data.name: AuthorizedNetworksWindowAddNetworkButton
data.comment: Title for the button to create a new authorized network.

data.name: AuthorizedNetworksWindowInvalidCidrFormatErrorTitle
data.comment: Title for an error message in the authorized networks dialog for an ipv4 address.

data.name: AuthorizedNetworksWindowInvalidCidrFormatErrorMessage
data.comment: Message for an error message in the authorized networks dialog for an ipv4 address.

data.name: ResetPasswordConfirmationPromptMessage
data.value: Are you sure you want to reset the password for the user {0} in instance {1}? This operation cannot be cancelled.
data.comment: The message for the confirmation prompt for resetting or creating a password. {0) is the user name, {1} is the instance name.

data.name: ResetPasswordConfirmationPromptTitle
data.comment: The title for the confirmation prompt for resetting or creating a password. {0) is the user name, {1} is the instance name.

data.name: ResetPasswordFailedPromptMessage
data.comment: Message shown when the reset operation fails. {0} is the instance name, {1} is the error message.

data.name: ResetPasswordGcloudLinkCaption
data.comment: Caption for the link for Gcloud.

data.name: ResetPasswordGcloudMissingBetaMessage
data.value: To use this feature you need to have the "beta" component of the Google Cloud SDK installed. Please do so by running the command: gcloud components install beta.
data.comment: Message shown when the beta component is missing.

data.name: ResetPasswordGcloudMissingComponentTitle
data.comment: Title for the dialog that informs the user that a Cloud SDK component is needed but not installed.

data.name: ResetPasswordGcloudMissingMessage
data.value: To use this feature you need to have the Google Cloud SDK is installed and available in the path, and that the "beta" component is installed. Please restart Visual Studio after the Google Cloud SDK has finished installing. You can install the Google Cloud SDK by following this link.
data.comment: Message shown when gcloud is not installed.

data.name: ResetPasswordMissingGcloudTitle
data.comment: Title for the prompts shown when gcloud is not installed.

data.name: ResetPasswordUserNameCaption
data.comment: Caption for the user name textbox.

data.name: ResetPasswordWindowTitle
data.comment: The title for the reset password dialog. {0} is the instance name.

data.name: ShowPasswordCopyFailedMessage
data.value: The copy operation failed, this might happen if another program has the Windows Clipboard open, such as a virtual machine agent.
data.comment: Message shown when the copy operation fails.

data.name: ShowPasswordCopyFailedTitle
data.comment: Title of the prompt shown when the copy operation fails.

data.name: ShowPasswordCopyPasswordButtonCaption
data.comment: Caption for the copy password button.

data.name: ShowPasswordHidePasswordTooltip
data.comment: The tooltip shown to hide the password.

data.name: ShowPasswordMessage
data.value: The password for user {0} in instance {1} is:
data.comment: The message shown for the password textblock. {0} is the user name, {1} is the instance name.

data.name: ShowPasswordShowPasswordTooltip
data.comment: The tooltip shown to show the password.

data.name: ShowPasswordWindowTitle
data.comment: The title for the show password window. {0} is the name of the instance.

data.name: UiCancelButtonCaption
data.comment: Caption for Cancel buttons.

data.name: UiCloseButtonCaption
data.comment: Caption for the close window button.

data.name: UiDownloadButtonCaption
data.comment: The caption for the general download button.

data.name: UiOkButtonCaption
data.comment: Caption for Ok buttons.

data.name: UiSaveButtonCaption
data.comment: Caption for Save buttons.

data.name: UiDeleteButtonCaption
data.comment: Caption for Delete buttons.

data.name: UiUndoButtonCaption
data.comment: Caption for Undo buttons.

data.name: UiOpenOnCloudConsoleMenuHeader
data.comment: Header for the menu that opens the item in the cloud console.

data.name: UiPropertiesMenuHeader
data.comment: Header for the generic properties menu item, to show the properties window.

data.name: CloudExplorerGcsBucketLocationDescription
data.value: The location where the bucket resides.
data.comment: The description of the location property in a GCS bucket.

data.name: CloudExplorerGcsBucketLocationDisplayName
data.comment: The display name for the location property in a GCS bucket.

data.name: CloudExplorerGcsShowBucketsCommand
data.comment: The command to show the buckets in a flat list.

data.name: CloudExplorerGcsShowLocationsCommand
data.comment: The command to use use to show the buckets per location.
